name: @saekitominaga/customelements-tooltip
description: Implement Tooltip UI component by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tooltip.js -- brotlin compress dist/Tooltip.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tooltip.js -- terser dist/Tooltip.js -o dist/Tooltip.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/Tooltip.js.map',filename='Tooltip.js',includeSources,url='Tooltip.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tooltip.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/Tooltip.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/Tooltip.d.ts -- cpy dist/Tooltip.d.ts dist --rename=Tooltip.min.d.ts
